description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to assist the Recipient in assessing the commercial viability of the geothermal resource in Fiale Caldera within the Lake Assal region.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Recruitment of fiduciary staff | Description :Recruitment of an internationally recruited PMU director, anaccountant, a procurement specialist, an environmental safeguards specialist, and a social safeguard specialist. | Due Date:17-Dec-2014
Finance Agreement :Update of Project Operation Manual (POM) | Description :The POM has been updated in a manner satisfactory to theAssociation. | Due Date :31-Dec-2014

title.narrative: Access to the site is constructed
Develop a fully-fledged power generation feasibility study
Well test results independently reviewed and certified
Geothermal well test protocol developed and in place
Publish periodic updates of project implementation
